mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bm_review ( reviewTitle, reviewContent, reviewScore, imgPath, storeIdn, userIdn, userNickname ) VALUES ( #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewScore}, #{imgPath}, #{storeIdn}, #{userIdn}, #{userNickname} )
mapper.select: SELECT reviewIdn, reviewTitle, reviewContent, reviewScore, imgPath, DATE_FORMAT(regDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS regDate FROM bm_review WHERE storeIdn = #{storeIdn} ORDER BY regDate desc

SELECT FORMAT(@ROWNUM := @ROWNUM+1, 0) AS rowNum, A.reviewIdn, A.reviewTitle, A.reviewContent, A.reviewScore, DATE_FORMAT(A.regDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS regDate, (SELECT storeName FROM bm_store WHERE storeIdn = A.storeIdn) AS storeName FROM bm_review AS A, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) B WHERE userIdn = #{userIdn} ORDER BY A.regDate DESC
